titleStmt.title: A proclamation adjourning the Parliament from the fourteenth of January instant, to the fifteenth day of April next, 1692.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the fourth day of January, and of Our Reign the third year, 1692.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
